imdb.plot outline: Half hour deep-dive conversation and commentary to breakdown current issues/topics of interest/value and breakthrough to solutions for a better life. The show aim is to inform and inspire, fill a gap in the English-language Hispanic talk demographic, bring heart and a new perspective into conversations with guests from the arts, science, business and personal development.
imdb.title: Maryl Today
plot: One-one interviews with experts and everyday people on topics that matter today.

Half hour deep-dive conversation and commentary to breakdown current issues/topics of interest/value and breakthrough to solutions for a better life. The show aim is to inform and inspire, fill a gap in the English-language Hispanic talk demographic, bring heart and a new perspective into conversations with guests from the arts, science, business and personal development.
